EmailTemplate.name: 01_30_2014 NII Follow up.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: NII Webcast Recording
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thanks for registering for the webcast "How VMTurbo Helped NII Better Protect Operations, Manage Capacity and Plan for the Future" on Wednesday, January 22nd. As a follow-up, we've provided the recording in addition to a few of the many resources designed to dive deeper into the ways VMTurbo will dramatically improve how you control and automate your virtual data center.
- Webcast recording <http://bit.ly/1d89xYY> - Trial Download <http://bit.ly/1doILvj> check out VMTurbo in your environment, absolutely free - Whitepaper <http://bit.ly/1cvctTY> on reducing compute costs in VMware vCloud Director Environments
We will be following up with you shortly to understand your priorities and interest in learning more about VMTurbo.
Kind regards VMTurbo
